text: Hi everyone, Is there any updates regarding Common modules "*Header*"? we should have option for H1-H6 since Themes are already use by other client. In the backend it always set to *H1* which bad for *SEO* which is also hassle to change in the future when the content is already populated in multiple pages. Thanks

Hi all,

Quick question; can we actually have this theme feature on an existing page created form a regular template?

Given that there is a list of live pages created with regular HS templates and we want to have this new *theme feature* enabled on them.
I see that there is no option to switch the template of such pages with the a theme template, though.

Any ideas to make it happen?
